name: Build snake game
recv_texts:
Done! Created a complete, playable Snake game at ~/dev/lemon/content/games/snake.html.

Features

Core Gameplay:

- Canvas-based rendering with smooth animations
- Arrow key controls for desktop
- Swipe gesture controls for mobile
- Score counter with persistent high score (saved to localStorage)
- Game over detection + restart functionality
Lemon Theme:- Light yellow gradient background (#FFFACD, #FFF8DC, #F0E68C)
- Snake eats 🍋 lemons (golden ovals with texture dots and highlights)
- Green sna

name: Build trivia game
recv_texts:
The trivia game is ready! Here's what I built:

🎮 zeebot Trivia

Location: ~/dev/lemon/content/games/trivia.py

Features:

- 32 questions across 3 categories:- 💰 Crypto (11 questions) - Bitcoin, Ethereum, consensus, DeFi, MEV
- 🤖 AI (11 questions) - LLMs, transformers, RLHF, neural networks
- ⚡ Elixir/BEAM (10 questions) - OTP, GenServer, processes, fault tolerance

- 3 Difficulty levels:- Easy: Basic concepts only
- Medium: Easy + Medium questions
- Hard: All questions (including the spicy ones

name: Build text adventure
recv_texts:
I've created The Lemon Grove Adventure - a text adventure game where you play as zeebot exploring a mysterious lemon grove! Here's what's included:

Game Features

🗺️ 11 Rooms to Explore

1. Grove Entrance - Your starting point with paths to all major areas
2. The Scheduler Tree - Threading puzzles and the frozen cron daemon
3. Transport Meadow - Channel challenges with a binary-speaking guardian
4. Engine Forge - Where agents are forged and delegated
5. BEAM Cathedral - OTP wisdom and the seale
